p: Compound 318 was tested for antibacterial activity against Mycobacterium marinum ATCCBAA-535. Although rifampin as positive control showed significantly in vitro antibacterial activity against Mycobacterium marinum ATCCBAA-535 with IC 50 of 2.1 µM, compound 318 also exhibited potential inhibitory activity with IC 50 of 64 µM [ 106].
